## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3de6e0f7e04c52c1fba54af4c6255b17cc3bccb826bd4d9caa3093cac0f175f0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'frontegg-nuxt-example' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
